Sherpa cuisine ko barema kehi jankari dinu na!

Sure! Hamro restaurant ma Sherpa cuisine ko ni dherai options chha. Sherpa khana ma chha thukpa, momo, tsampa, ra butter tea. Thukpa ekdum warming soup hunchha, momo ta babbal popular chha, tsampa barley flour ko hunchha, ra butter tea ni unique taste ko hunchha. Yo Sherpa community ko high altitude living ko adapting food haru ho. Tapai lai pani yo highland ko swad lina swagat chha.
Customer asks for recommendations on the best cultural dishes to try at the restaurant. The agent suggests a few must-try items and their features.
Best cultural dishes ko recommendation cha?

Hamro restaurant ko must-try cultural dishes ma chha bhaktapur ko juju dhau, ilam ko chiya, ra Mustang ko apple cider. Juju dhau king of yogurts ho, ekdum creamy ra rich flavor ko hunchha. Ilam ko chiya ta world famous nai chha, refreshing ra aromatic hunchha. Ra Mustang ko apple cider ni ekdum unique ra refreshing drink ho. Yo items haru hamro Nepali culture ko essence carry garchhan ra tapai lai definitely try garna ma suggest garnechhu.
Customer is curious about the vegan options in Nepali cultural cuisine at the restaurant. The agent provides a list of vegan dishes and their ingredients.
Nepali cultural cuisine ma vegan options chha?

Hajur, hamro restaurant ma vegan customers ko lagi pani cultural cuisine ko dherai options chha. Vegan dishes ma chha dal bhat tarkari, aloo ko achar, ra saag ra bhatmas. Yo sabai pure veggie based dishes ho ra traditional Nepali masala ko use garera baneko hunchha. Dal bhat tarkari ta staple food ho, jasma tarkari ma seasonal vegetables ko use hunchha. Aloo ko achar ni ekdum tangy ra spicy hunchha. Saag ra bhatmas ni nutritious ra tasty hunchha. Vegan ho ki non-vegan, sabai ko taste ko lagi kura milchha hamro yaha.
Customer wants to organize a cultural food event at the restaurant and inquires about the cultural food catering services. The agent provides options and details about event planning.

Traditional Nepali dishes dekhi modern fusion items samma, hamro chef haru le tapai ko event ko lagi best prepare garnechhan. Customer is planning a visit and asks about the restaurant's signature cultural dish. The agent proudly describes the signature dish and its preparation.
Restaurant ko signature cultural dish kun ho?

Hamro restaurant ko signature cultural dish ho Ghorkhali lamb. Yo dish ma local herbs ra spices sanga marinated lamb ko use garincha, ani slow-cooked method le baneko hunchha. Ghorkhali lamb ko taste ekdum rich ra authentic hunchha, ra yo dish le hamro Nepali warriors ko bravery ra culture ko representation garne gari prepare gareko hunchha. Tapai pani visit garda definitely yo dish try garnu hola, yo tapai lai ekdum 'kada' lagnechha!
Customer is inquiring about the sustainable practices the restaurant follows. The agent is explaining about the use of organic ingredients and waste management.

Hami yaha organic ingredients matra prayog garchhau, ra waste management ma ni dherai dhyan dinchhau. Sabai kura recycle garna khojchhau, compostable materials use garchhau, ani unnecessary plastic ko use minimize garchhau. Hamro aim chha environment lai kam se kam harm puryaune.
The customer is curious if the restaurant has any water conservation methods in place. The agent provides details on how they save water.

Ho ni, pani bachat ko lagi hami low-flow faucets ra toilets install gareka chhau, ra kitchen ma pani reuse ko practices pani follow garchhau. Rainwater harvesting system pani chha, jasle pani ko sustainable use ma sahayog garnechha.
The customer wants to know if the restaurant uses renewable energy. The agent enthusiastically shares the initiatives taken.
Tapai haru ko restaurant ma renewable energy sources ko use garchha ki nai?

Ambo, sahi ho! Hamro restaurant ma solar panels chhan, jasle hamro energy consumption lai dherai sustainable banauchha. Plus, energy-efficient appliances pani chhan, jasle energy use ghatauchha ra carbon footprint ni kam garchha.
The customer inquires about the restaurant's efforts to support local farmers. The agent replies with information on local sourcing.
Local farmers lai support garne gari tapai haru le kasto sourcing garne garchha?

Hami yaha local farmers bata organic ra taja sabji ra masu linchhau. Yo hamro local economy lai support garchha ra carbon emissions ni kam garchha, kina ki long-distance transportation ko need hunchhaudaina.
The customer is asking about the restaurant's policy on plastic usage. The agent explains their approach to reducing plastic.
Plastic ko use kam garna ko lagi tapai haru ko restaurant ma k kadam chalnu bhayeko chha?
Plastic ko use kam garna lai, hami biodegradable containers ra straws use garchhau. Takeaway ko lagi pani paper bags matra use garchhau. Hamro goal chha zero-plastic policy maintain garne.
The customer questions about how the restaurant handles food waste. The agent outlines their waste reduction strategy.
Food waste lai manage garna ko lagi tapai ko restaurant ma k kisim ko strategy chha?

Food waste minimize garna ko lagi, hami portion control ma dherai dhyan dinchhau. Leftover food compost garne garinchha, ani unsold food items lai local shelters ma donate garchhau. Customers lai pani encourage garchhau ki they only order what they can eat.
The customer is interested in knowing if the restaurant offers any incentives for customers who participate in sustainability. The agent discusses their reward system.
Sustainability ma participate garne customers lai kehi incentive offer garchha tapai ko restaurant?

Babbal prashna! Yes, hami green initiatives ma sahbhagita garne customers lai special discounts ra loyalty points provide garchhau. Jasto ki, reusable containers lyaaune customers lai discount, ra cycle or walk garera aune customers lai complimentary drinks offer garchhau.
The customer wants to understand if the restaurant has any green certifications. The agent is proud to share their certifications.
Tapai ko restaurant ma kuna kuna green certifications haru chhan?

Hami proud chhau ki hami Green Restaurant Association bata certified chhau, ra hami ISO 14001 environmental management standard ko pani adherence garchhau. Yo certifications le hamro commitment to sustainability lai reflect garchha.
Customer is curious about the restaurant's menu and if it includes any sustainable food options. The agent details the menu's focus on sustainability.
Sustainable food options tapai ko menu ma chhan ki chhaina?

Ho, hami yaha sustainability lai priority dinchhau, ani hamro menu ma seasonally available, local, ra organic food items ko wide range chha. Vegetarian ra vegan options pani dherai chhan, jo environment-friendly hunchhan.
The customer asks how the restaurant educates its staff on sustainability. The agent explains their training programs.
Sustainability ko barema tapai haru ko staff haru lai kasto training dinunchha?

Hamro staff haru lai regular training dinchhau sustainability practices ko barema. Yo training ma waste reduction, energy conservation, ra sustainable sourcing ko best practices haru include garchhau. Hamro team lai empower garchhau ki they can make eco-friendly decisions in their daily work.
Customer inquiring about the best wine to pair with a steak dinner. The agent is giving suggestions with a mix of Nepali and English terms, using colloquial language.
Steak dinner sanga kun wine ramro huncha?

Steak sanga ta red wine ekdum perfect huncha. Merlot ya Cabernet Sauvignon try garnu hola, tyo meal ko flavor lai enhance garnechha. Aru khas preference chha bhane sodhnu hola, ma sanga different options chhan.
Customer asking for a wine recommendation to go with seafood. The agent responds with options and explains why they are suitable.
Seafood ko lagi kasto wine ramro hola?

Seafood sanga generally white wine jasto ki Chardonnay ya Pinot Grigio ramro janchha. Tyo freshness ra lightness lai balance garnechha. Ani, sushi sanga sake pani try garna saknuhunchha, ekdum babbal combo hunchha.
Customer is curious about wine options for a vegetarian meal. The agent provides a friendly and informative response.
Vegetarian khana sanga kasto wine huncha ramro?

Vegetarian dish haru sanga light bodied wine jasto ki Sauvignon Blanc ya Pinot Noir ramro hunchha. Tara yadi tapai spicy vegetarian khana khane ho bhane, Riesling pani ekdum sahi hunchha, tyo spice lai balance garnechha.
Customer desires to know the best wine to enjoy with a cheese platter. The agent gives a delightful and knowledgeable response.
Cheese platter ko lagi kun wine suggest garchhau?

Cheese platter ko lagi ta wine ko selection ali careful garnu parchha. Soft cheese sanga light wines jasto ki Pinot Grigio, hard cheese sanga bold wines jasto ki Cabernet. Blue cheese sanga ta sweet wine jasto ki Port wine ekdum sahi hunchha.
A customer is looking for a wine that would complement a spicy dish. The agent offers options with a casual tone.
Masaledar khana ko lagi kasto wine hunchha best?
Masaledar khana ko lagi, sweet wines jasto ki Gewurztraminer ya semi-sweet Riesling ramro hunchha. Tyo masala ko heat lai balance garera swadistha anubhav dinchha.
Customer wants to know a good wine to pair with a dessert. The agent provides a sweet and helpful reply.
Dessert sanga kasto wine pairing hunchha ramro?
Dessert sanga sweet wine jasto ki Moscato ya Port wine ramro hunchha. Chocolate based dessert ko lagi dark wine jasto ki Zinfandel pani try garne option chha, tyo ekdum danger hunchha.
Customer inquires about a wine that would go well with a pizza. The agent uses a friendly approach to suggest wines.
Pizza sanga kasto wine khane ho?
Pizza sanga Italian wines jasto ki Chianti ya Sangiovese ekdum match hunchha. Cheese ra tomato base ko flavor lai complement garnechha. Simple Margherita pizza sanga light red wine pani sahi hunchha.
Customer is looking for a wine suggestion to pair with a lamb dish. The agent responds with enthusiasm and expertise.
Lamb dish ko lagi kun wine hunchha best?

Lamb dish ko lagi bold red wines jasto ki Shiraz ya Malbec ramro hunchha. Tyo rich flavor ra tenderness lai enhance garnechha. Yadi lamb dish ma herbs ko use bhaeko chha bhane, herbaceous wines jasto ki Cabernet Franc pani herne option chha.
Customer seeks advice on wine to pair with a curry dish. The agent gives an informative and friendly recommendation.
Curry dish sanga kasto wine suggest garchhau?
Curry dish ko flavor lai balance garna off-dry wines jasto ki Riesling ya Gewurztraminer ramro hunchha. Tyo spiciness lai counter garnechha ra swadistha experience dinchha.
Customer is interested in a wine that pairs well with grilled fish. The agent provides a suggestion with a touch of local flair.
Grilled fish sanga kasto wine pair hunchha?

Grilled fish sanga light white wines jasto ki Sauvignon Blanc ya unoaked Chardonnay ramro hunchha. Tyo freshness ra delicate flavor lai highlight garnechha. Local Newari style grilled fish sanga ta local rice wine pani try garna saknuhunchha, ekdum dallai hunchha.
Customer is asking if the restaurant offers private dining rooms for special events such as birthdays or anniversaries. The agent responds positively and provides details.

Ho ni, hamro restaurant ma special events ko lagi private dining rooms ko vyavastha chha. Yaha ko ambiance ni ekdum ramro ra cozy chha, jasto ki tapai ko event lai perfect banaune. Aru kei jankari chahincha bhane sodhnu hola.
The customer wants to know about the decoration options for private dining rooms. The agent explains the available themes and customization options.
Private dining room ko lagi decoration options kasto chha?

Hamro restaurant le private dining ko lagi dherai themes ra decoration options provide garne garchha. Customer is inquiring about the special menu for private dining events. The agent details the customizable menu options and special cuisines.

Private dining ko lagi hamro restaurant le ekdam versatile menu options provide garchha. The customer is curious about how to book a private dining room and what the process entails. The agent provides the booking procedure and contact information.

Aru kei assistance ko lagi, please feel free to ask ni.
Customer wants to know the maximum capacity of private dining rooms. The agent describes the room sizes and how many people they can accommodate.
Kati sano ra thulo group ko lagi private dining room ko capacity chha?

Hamro restaurant ko private dining rooms haru different sizes ma available chhan. Sano family gatherings dekhi corporate events samma ko lagi suitable rooms chhan. Sano room ma 10-15 jana samma ko group lai accommodate garna sakincha, ani thulo rooms ma chai 50-100 jana samma ko group lai comfortably rakhna sakincha. Tapai ko event ko size ra requirement anusar room choose garna saknuhunchha.
The customer is asking about the overall experience of private dining at the restaurant. The agent highlights the exclusive services and ambiance.
Private dining ma overall experience kasto hunchha?

Private dining ko experience hamro restaurant ma ekdum kada chha. Tapai lai personalized service, exclusive ambiance, ra chef ko special attention milchha. Ani obviously, food ko taste ni ekdum babbal hunchha. Tapai ko special day lai grand banauna hamro team sadhai ready chha.
Customer is concerned about the cost for booking a private dining room. The agent explains the pricing structure and any additional charges.

Customer is checking the availability of private dining rooms on specific dates. The agent advises on how to check availability and suggests early booking.
Yo mahina ko end ma private dining room available chha?

Customer has special requests for their private dining event. The agent explains how the restaurant can accommodate these requests.

Customer inquires if the restaurant offers catering services for private dining events. The agent confirms and provides details on catering options.

Customer is asking about the schedule for live entertainment at the restaurant. The agent provides the weekly schedule.

Customer is curious about any extra charges for the live entertainment. The agent clarifies the pricing.

Customer inquires about the types of live entertainment offered. The agent lists various options.
Kun kun prakar ko live entertainment hunchha tapai ko restaurant ma?

Hamro restaurant ma various types ko live entertainment hunchha. Jazz nights, acoustic sessions, cultural dances, comedy shows, ra DJ nights pani hunchhan. Tapai ko mood anusaar, choose garera enjoy garne ho!
The customer wants to know if the restaurant provides special live entertainment for celebrations like birthdays. The agent responds with options.

Customer is interested in knowing if there are any food packages available during live entertainment. The agent provides details.
Live entertainment ko time ma special food packages pani chhan ki?

Bilkul chhan! Live entertainment enjoy garda, tapai le special curated food packages pani choose garna saknuhunchha. Hamro chefs le specially designed garnechhan, jasle tapai ko taste buds lai ekdum khusi parnechha. Try garnuhos, sahi ho!
Customer wants to know how long the live entertainment usually lasts. The agent gives a brief overview.

Customer is asking if they can make special song requests during the live entertainment. The agent encourages the customer.

Customer inquiring about the availability and details of cooking classes offered by the restaurant. The agent provides information using a mix of Nepali colloquial words and English.

Customer asking if the restaurant offers any special culinary experiences for couples.
Couples ko lagi kunai special culinary experience cha?

Ho ni, definitely! Hamro restaurant le couples lai romantic cooking session offer garchha, jahan tapai haru ek arka sanga interact gardai cooking siknuhunchha. The customer wants to know if there are any cooking classes for kids.

Inquiry about whether the restaurant offers any vegetarian cooking classes.
Vegetarian cooking class cha ta?

Ho hajur, hamro restaurant le vegetarian cooking class ni offer garchha. Vegetarian dishes haru ko variety ra taste ko barema hamro experienced chefs le sikaudinuhunchha. Customer is curious about any upcoming themed cooking classes.
Upcoming themed cooking classes ko barema jankari pauna sakchhu?

Sure! Aaunuhos, hamro restaurant ma every month ek special theme based cooking class hunchha. Yo mahina ko theme 'Street Foods Around the World' ho. Hamro chefs le tapai lai vividha desh ko street food banayera sikaudinuhunchha. Ekdum fun ra informative session hunchha, tapai pani join garnuhos!
The customer is asking if the cooking classes include any international cuisines.
International cuisines ko cooking class cha?

Bilkul cha hajur! Hamro restaurant le various international cuisines ko cooking classes provide garchha. French, Italian, Mexican, you name it, hamro chefs haru le tapai lai tyo cuisines ko authentic recipes ra techniques sikaudinuhunchha. Tapai kun specific cuisine ma interest rakhnuhunchha bhane sodhna saknuhunchha, hamro team ready chha tapai lai assist garna.
A customer wants to learn about traditional Nepali cooking and is asking if the restaurant provides such classes.
Traditional Nepali cooking class cha?

Ho hajur, hamro restaurant le traditional Nepali cooking classes ni offer garchha. Tapai le authentic Nepali khana ko recipes ra secret masala haru siknuhunchha. Plus, local ingredients ko use ra preparation methods pani sikaudinuhunchha. Yo classes hamro culture ra heritage lai celebrate garna ko lagi ekdum sahi ho.
Customer inquiring if the restaurant has any cooking classes for beginners.
Beginners ko lagi cooking class cha?

Hajur, beginners haru lai dhyan ma rakhda hamro restaurant le basic cooking skills sikaudine classes haru arrange garchha. Yedi tapai cooking ma naya hunchha bhane, yo classes le tapai lai kitchen ma confidence build garna madat garnechha. Basic knife skills dekhi lekhera simple recipes samma, tapai lai step by step guide garchhau.
The customer is interested in baking and asks if there are any specific classes for that.
Baking ko lagi kunai class cha?

Ho hajur, baking enthusiasts ko lagi hamro restaurant le special baking classes arrange garchha. Cakes, cookies, breads, and pastries ko variety sikna saknuhunchha. Hamro professional bakers le tapai lai baking ko fine arts sikaudinuhunchha. Yedi tapai baking ma interested hunchha, yo classes tapai ko lagi perfect hunchha.
Customer is looking for a cooking class that also teaches food presentation and plating techniques.
Food presentation ra plating techniques sikna milne cooking class cha?

Absolutely, hamro restaurant le cooking skills matra hoina, food presentation ra plating techniques pani sikaudine classes provide garchha. Customer is inquiring about vegan meal options and agent is providing details on the vegan menu and customization options.
Tapaiko restaurant ma vegan meal options chha?

Ho ni, hamro restaurant ma vegan meal ko ekdum ramro variety chha. We have different salads, soups, and main courses that are completely plant-based. The customer is asking if the restaurant offers gluten-free meals, and the agent is explaining the available gluten-free options.
Gluten-free meals paucha yaha?

Yes, gluten-free meals ko lagi pani hamisanga options chha. Hamro menu ma gluten-free breads, pasta, and even desserts available chhan. Sabai ingredients haru carefully selected hunchhan to avoid cross-contamination. Aaainch, gluten-sensitive customers ko lagi ni we make sure that they get to enjoy a delicious and safe meal.
A customer with specific food allergies is asking about the menu, and the agent is reassuring them about the restaurant's allergy-friendly options.
Mero peanut allergy chha, tapaiharu ko menu ma allergy-friendly options chhan?

Hajur, we take food allergies very seriously. Hamro menu ma allergy-friendly options chhan, and we can customize any dish to meet your needs. Hamro kitchen team le cross-contamination avoid garna special care linchhan. Please let us know about your allergies in detail so we can serve you better.
The customer is interested in knowing about vegan dessert options, and the agent is listing the available vegan sweets.
Kun kun vegan desserts chhan tapaiharu sanga?

For vegan desserts, we have a katro selection! We offer vegan chocolate cake, fruit sorbets, and even vegan cookies. Ani, we're always experimenting with new recipes to provide more variety. Yadi tapai specific taste preferences chha bhane we can also customize desserts for you.
A customer needs a meal customized for their allergies, and the agent is discussing how they can accommodate the request.
Maile specific allergies anusar customized meal order garna sakchu?

Bilkul, tapai le allergies ko barema hamilai inform gare pachi, hamro chefs tapai ko diet requirements anusar meal tailor garna ready hunuhunchha. Just provide us with the details, and we'll take care of the rest. Safety and satisfaction of our customers is our top priority.
The customer is asking about vegan breakfast options, and the agent is detailing the vegan breakfast menu.
Bihana ko breakfast ma vegan options ke ke chhan?

Vegan breakfast ko lagi, we have a variety of options like oatmeal with fruits, vegan pancakes, and smoothie bowls. Plus, we can make any of our regular breakfast items vegan by substituting certain ingredients. Tapaiko bihana fresh ra energetic suru garna, we make sure to provide healthy and delicious vegan choices.
A customer is curious if gluten-free pizza is available, and the agent is confirming its availability and options.
Gluten-free pizza paucha yaha?

Yes, gluten-free pizza available chha. We have a range of toppings that you can choose from, and our gluten-free dough is made fresh in-house. Tapaiko taste and health concerns lai keeping in mind, we provide the best gluten-free pizza experience.
The customer is checking for nut-free meal options due to an allergy, and the agent is providing information on the nut-free dishes.
Nut-free meals ko options chhan tapaiharu ko menu ma?

Absolutely, nut-free meal options chhan hamro menu ma. We ensure that our dishes are prepared without any nuts or nut-based products, especially for customers with nut allergies. Hamro kitchen staff le careful monitoring garchhan to prevent any cross-contact with nuts.
The customer is inquiring about dairy-free cuisine options, and the agent is offering details on the dairy-free menu items.
Dairy-free cuisine options chhan?

The customer is asking if the restaurant provides live music for group events, and the agent informs about the entertainment options.

Customer is curious about the seasonal menu and what it includes. Agent is providing details about the current seasonal offerings.

Customer is inquiring about the sustainable practices of the restaurant. The agent is explaining how the restaurant contributes to sustainability.

Customer asks if the chef's specials incorporate organic ingredients. Agent explains the use of organic ingredients in the dishes.
Chef ko specials ma organic ingredients ko use gareko chha?

Customer is inquiring about the eco-friendly transportation options available and the agent is providing information about electric vehicles and bicycle services.

Customer is curious about the availability of charging stations for electric vehicles, and the agent provides details about the charging network and facilities.
Electric vehicle ko charging station haru kati widely available chhan?

Electric vehicles ko charging stations hamro city ma dherai chhan. Major locations ra shopping malls haru ma pani chhan, ani residential areas ma ni. Plus, hamro mobile app bata tapai nearby charging points ko location pani herera book garna saknuhunchha.

Day trip ko lagi bicycle rent ma linu sakinchha?

A customer is asking about travel packages that prioritize eco-friendly transportation, and the agent offers information on green travel packages including electric car tours.
Eco-friendly transportation prioritize gareko travel packages chhan?

Ho, hamro sanga green travel packages chhan, jasle eco-friendly transportation lai prioritize garchha. Electric car tours dekhi lekhesamma ko hiking packages samma, sabai environment-friendly chhan. Yadi tapai nature ko saathma explore garna chahanu hunchha, yini packages tapailai sahi hunchha.
The customer is seeking information on sustainable tourism options and the agent describes various eco-friendly activities and transport methods for tourists.
Sustainable tourism ko lagi kun kun options chhan?

Sustainable tourism ko lagi, hamro sanga diverse options chhan. Eco-friendly homestays, local culture explore garna walking tours, ani carbon footprint kam garna electric vehicle use garna sakincha. A customer is inquiring about carpooling services and the agent explains how carpooling works and its environmental benefits.

Customer wants to know about low emission zones in the city and the agent provides information on the areas where low emission vehicles are encouraged.
City ma low emission zones chhan ra?

The customer is asking about eco-friendly city tours and the agent suggests tours that use electric buses and walking routes to explore the city.
Eco-friendly city tour ko options ke ke chhan?

Eco-friendly city tour ko lagi, hamro electric buses ko use garera city ko main attractions herne option chha. Ani, walking tours pani chhan jasle tapai lai city ko history ra culture close up ma experience garna dinchha. Plus, yasari explore garda, tapai environment ma pani positive impact paryo.
Customer is looking for advice on how to travel in an environmentally conscious way, and the agent gives tips on reducing carbon footprint while traveling.
Environmentally conscious way ma travel garne tips dinu na?

Travel garda environment ko dhyan ma rakhnu ko lagi, tapai public transport ko use garne, non-peak hours ma travel garne, light packing garne, ani reusable water bottles use garne kura haru garna saknuhunchha. Plus, jaha possible chha tyaha walking ya cycling garne try garna saknuhunchha. Yadi tapai long distance travel garna chahanu hunchha bhane, direct flights linu better hunchha carbon emissions kam garna.

Customer inquiring about the parking options available near the transportation service office. The agent is providing details about the parking facilities, including security and payment options, using a mix of Nepali and English colloquial terms.
Transportation service office najikai parking ko suvidha chha ki chhaina?

Ho ni, hamro office najikai parking ko ramro suvidha chha. Security pani tight chha, 24/7 surveillance cameras chalirakhne garincha. Parking ko lagi minimal charge lagcha, ani monthly pass system pani chha jasle tapai lai alli sasto parne garho. Jhan parking garne thau ni ekdum safe ra secure chha, so no tension!
Customer wants to know how long they can park their vehicle at the transportation service's parking area. The agent explains the duration options and any associated costs.
Yo parking ma maximum kati samma ko lagi vehicle rakhna milcha?

Tapai yaha upto 48 hours samma ko lagi vehicle rakhna saknuhunchha. Tesaile long-term parking ko lagi ni suitable chha. 48 hours bhanda badhi ko lagi chai alag charge system chha, tyo detail ko lagi office ma aayera bujhnuparcha. Ani short-term parking ko lagi pani hourly rates available chhan, jasle tapailai flexibility dinchha.
A customer is asking if there are specific parking spots for bikes and what the facilities include. The agent provides information on bike parking amenities.
Yaha bikes ko lagi special parking spot chha ki chhaina?

Bilkul chha ni! Bikes ko lagi special area allocate gareko chha. Yaha bike racks chhan, ani security wise pani ekdum tight chha. Bike parking ko lagi charge pani less chha compared to cars. Plus, tapai bike lai lock garna ko lagi personal locks ni use garna saknuhunchha for extra safety.

Electric vehicles ko lagi parking ra charging facilities chha?

Yes, electric vehicles ko lagi hamisanga special parking spots chhan, ani charging stations ni provide garchham. Disabled individuals ko lagi parking ko suvidha chha?

Hajur, disabled individuals ko lagi hamisanga reserved parking spots chhan jaha accessibility ekdum ramro chha. Lifts ra ramps pani chhan, jasle wheelchair users lai sajilo hunchha. The customer is asking about the possibility of overnight parking and the agent provides information on the security and cost for such service.
Yaha overnight parking garna milcha?

Milcha ni! Overnight parking ko facility chha, ani security pani ekdum solid chha. Full night ko lagi ek fixed rate chha, ani tapai le sanga vehicle safe hunchha bhanna ko lagi full assurance dinchham. Plus, overnight parking garda kunai extra charge ni hudaina, so no worries on that part.
Customer wants to know about monthly or yearly parking subscription plans. The agent details the different plans and benefits.
Monthly ya yearly parking subscription plans chha ki chhaina?

A customer with a large vehicle is asking about the parking options for bigger vehicles like buses and trucks. The agent explains the facilities and any special arrangements.
Thulo vehicles jasto ki bus ra trucks ko lagi parking chha ki chhaina?

The customer is asking if there are any special parking arrangements during events. The agent informs about the event parking management and any additional services.

Customer inquiring about bike sharing program details and the cycling routes available. Agent provides comprehensive information in Nepanglish with colloquial terms.

Sure! Hamro bike sharing program ekdum sahaj ra sasto chha. Tapai le app download garnu bhayo bhane, nearby station bata bike liyera go around garna saknuhunchha.
