Kasaiko lagi ni explore garna, kasaiko lagi fitness ko lagi, bike sharing nai kada option ho!
Customer asks about the cost of renting a bike through the bike sharing program. Agent responds with pricing details and additional benefits.
Bike rent ma kati lagcha?

Bike rent ta ekdum affordable chha. First hour ko lagi just NPR 100 matra, ani tesko pachi NPR 50 per hour. Plus, tapai long term use garna chahanu hunchha bhane, monthly subscription plan ni chha, jasma unlimited rides milchha. Babbal deal ho, haina?
Customer is curious about the availability of bikes at any given time. Agent assures availability and explains the system.
Bike haru sadhai available hunchha ki hunchha?

Ho, hamro system ma yasto cha ki, bikes haru almost sadhai available hunchha. Stations haru strategic locations ma cha, ani we make sure ki bikes haru balanced rahanchha. Yadi kahile kahi bike chhaina bhane, app ma alert paunu hunchha ra arko nearest station ko info ni milcha. Sahi ho?
Customer inquires about the types of bikes and their features in the sharing program. Agent gives a detailed description.
Kun type ko bikes chha ra k k k features chhan?

Hamro bike sharing program ma variety of bikes chhan - standard bikes, electric bikes, ani even tandems pani. Standard bikes ma comfortable seat, gear system, ani basket chha. Electric bikes le long distance travel lai easy banaucha without much effort. Ani tandems chai if you wanna have fun with a friend. Plus, sabai bikes ma GPS tracker chha, so security pani tight chha. Ambo, ramro chha ni!
Customer concerned about safety measures for the bike sharing program. Agent provides reassurance with safety protocols.
Bike sharing ma safety ko lagi k k arrangements chhan?

Safety first ni! Hamro bike sharing program le safety ko lagi dherai measures liyeko chha. Pahilo, sabai bikes ma regular maintenance hunchha. Ani helmets, knee guards, ani elbow pads ni provide garchhau. Plus, hamro app ma emergency contact feature chha, jasma tapai immediate help maag garna saknuhunchha. Ride safe, feel safe!
Customer is asking about the benefits of becoming a member of the bike sharing program. Agent highlights the perks.
Membership linu ko benefits k k chhan?

Membership linu le tapai lai ekdum dallai benefits dinchha. First, tapai lai cheaper rates ma bikes rent garna milchha. Ani priority access ni paunu hunchha peak hours ma pani. Plus, monthly members lai exclusive discounts on local shops ra cafes ni chha. Ani events ma participate garna ko lagi ni special invites paunu hunchha. Membership le tapai ko cycling experience lai next level ma puryaucha.
Customer inquires about what happens if a bike needs repair or maintenance during their rental. Agent explains the procedure.
Bike ma kei problem aayo bhane maintenance ko laagi k garnu parchha?

Yadi bike ma kei technical issue aayo bhane, hamro app ma report garna saknuhunchha. Ani hamro team immediate respond garchha. We have a dedicated maintenance crew jo onsite aayera quick fix garchhan. Yadi major issue chha bhane, we'll provide you with a replacement bike ni. So, no worries!
Customer is looking for suggestions on the best cycling routes. Agent offers recommendations based on the customer's preferences.
Ramro cycling route ko suggestion pauna sakchhu?

Sure thing! Tapai lai city ko hustle bustle bata tada jana man cha ki nature enjoy garna? City routes ma Garden of Dreams ko aaspas ko area ekdum ramro chha, peaceful ra less traffic chha. Nature trails ma bhane Shivapuri National Park ko route try garna saknuhunchha. Ekdum scenic ra fresh environment chha. Plus, hamro app ma route ratings ra reviews ni hunchha, so tapai aafnai preference anusar choose garna saknuhunchha. Enjoy the ride!
Customer inquires about any partnerships between the bike sharing program and local businesses. Agent provides information on collaborations.
Bike sharing program le local businesses sanga partnership gareko chha?

Yes, hamro bike sharing program le local businesses sanga ramro sambandha rakhchha. We have partnered with cafes, restaurants, ra shops where our members get special discounts. Ani we also collaborate for events and promotions. Yo sambandha le local economy lai support garchha ra hamro members lai additional benefits ni dinchha. It's a win-win!
Customer is curious about the environmental impact of the bike sharing program. Agent discusses the eco-friendly aspects.
Bike sharing program ko environmental impact kasto chha?

Hamro bike sharing program le environment lai positive impact garchha. Bikes le carbon footprint kam garchha since they don't emit pollutants like cars do. Plus, cycling le physical health improve garchha ra traffic congestion ni reduce garchha. We're also working on adding more electric bikes, which are even more eco-friendly. So, by choosing to cycle, tapai pani environment ko care garna saknuhunchha. Let's go green together!
Customer inquiring about the availability of airport transfers and the agent providing details about the service, including timings and vehicle options.
Airport transfer service chha tapaiko sanga?

Ho ni, hamro sanga airport transfer service available chha. Tapaile chahema car, van, ya micro bus ni book garna saknuhunchha. Hami 24/7 service provide garne garchhau, so kunai pani time ma aunu bhayo bhane ni arrange garidinchha.
Customer asking about the shuttle service timings to and from the airport and the agent explaining the schedule.
Airport shuttle ko timings haru kati baje ko chhan?

Namaste! Hamro airport shuttle service bihana 5 baje dekhi raat ko 11 baje samma harai 30 minutes ma chalne garchha. Tapaile juna time ma comfortable hunuhunchha tei time ma booking garera safar garne suvidha chha.
Customer wants to know how to arrange an airport pickup and the agent providing the booking procedure.
Airport pickup kasari arrange garna sakinchha?

Airport pickup ko lagi tapai le hamro online platform ma jana saknuhunchha ya direct call garera ni book garna saknuhunchha. Tapaiko flight details ra pickup ko time provide garnu bhayo bhane, hamro driver tapai lai airport ma welcome garnechha.
Customer is curious about the cost of the shuttle service to the airport and the agent providing the pricing details.
Airport shuttle service ko laagi kati charge hunchha?

Hamro shuttle service ko laagi prati vyakti NPR 500 charge hunchha. Yadi tapai group ma hunuhunchha bhane, group discount pani chha. Ani luxury vehicles ko lagi alag pricing chha, tyasko lagi tapai le hamro website check garna saknuhunchha.
Customer inquires about how their luggage will be handled during airport transfer and the agent assures them of the service.
Airport transfer ma luggage kasari handle garinchha?

Tapai ko luggage ko chinta nagarnu hola. Hamro staff le tapai ko luggage lai safely handle garnechha. Thulo saman haru ko lagi pani enough space hunchha hamro vehicles ma, so tension free travel garna saknuhunchha.
Customer wants to know if they need to book the airport transfer in advance and the agent explains the benefits of advance booking.
Airport transfer ko lagi advance ma booking garnu parchha?

Advance ma booking garnu le tapai lai guaranteed service milnechha, especially high season ma. Yedi last minute ma pani chahincha bhane hami try garnechhau arrange garna, tara advance booking le tapai ko seat confirm hunchha.
A customer is asking about airport transfer options for a large group and the agent provides the available vehicle options.
Thulo group ko lagi airport transfer ko option chha?

Ho, thulo group ko lagi hamisanga micro bus ra mini coaches haru chhan. Yadi tapai ko group ma 10 bhandha badhi manche chhan bhane, mini coach perfect hunchha. Rates ra availability ko lagi tapai le hamro customer service sanga contact garnu parne hunchha.
Customer inquiring about the types of vehicles available for airport transfer and the agent listing the options.
Airport transfer ko lagi k kisim ko vehicles chhan?

Airport transfer ko lagi hami sanga sedan cars, SUVs, micro buses, ra mini coaches haru chhan. Tapai ko comfort ra requirement anusar vehicle choose garna saknuhunchha. Sabai vehicles ma AC ra free Wi-Fi ko facility pani chha.
Customer looking for a personalized airport transfer service and the agent describing the tailored services they offer.
Personalized airport transfer service pauna sakincha?

Ho, personalized airport transfer service hamro sanga chha. Tapaiko preference ko hisab le luxury vehicles, personal chauffeur, ra additional amenities ko vyavastha garnechhau. Yadi tapai special request haru chhan bhane, kripaya hamilai agadi nai inform garnu hola.
Customer concerned about safety measures during airport transfers and the agent reassuring the safety protocols they follow.
Airport transfer garda safety measures k kasto chha?

Safety hamro priority ho. Hamro sabai vehicles regularly sanitized hunchhan, drivers haru mask lagaunechhan, ra hand sanitizers pani vehicle ma available hunchhan. Plus, hamro drivers haru well-trained chhan ra safety rules haru strictly follow garchhan.
Customer is inquiring about the current traffic situation in Kathmandu city, particularly asking if there are any jams. The agent provides a detailed response including alternative routes.
Kathmandu ko traffic jam ko situation kasto chha aile?

Hajur, aile Kathmandu ma dherai thau ma traffic smooth chha. Tara New Road area ma ekdam jam chha because of road maintenance. Ma suggest garnechu ki, tapai Maharajgunj or Ring Road ko through jana try garnuhos. Tyo route ma traffic ali kam chha ra faster pani hunchha.
The customer is asking for the best time to travel to avoid traffic. The agent provides suggestions based on peak hours and also mentions a mobile app for real-time updates.
Traffic bata bachna ko lagi kun time ma travel garne ramro hola?

Bihana ko 7 dekhi 9 ra beluka ko 5 dekhi 7 samma traffic ekdum rush hunchha. So, yo time avoid garna ramro hunchha. Ani, hami sanga ek mobile app chha jaha tapai real-time traffic updates paunu hunchha. Yo app download garda, tapai aafno travel lai plan garna sajilo hunchha.
Customer needs information on traffic conditions for a specific route. The agent provides the current traffic status and recommends an early departure.
Lalitpur bata Bhaktapur jane route ma traffic kasto chha hola?

Hajur, Lalitpur bata Bhaktapur jane route ma aile traffic ekdum smooth chha. Tara, aaja local festival ko karan le beluka samma traffic jam huna sakchha. So, ma suggest garnechu ki tapai jati chado hunechha uti ramro.
The customer is concerned about road closures due to a local event. The agent confirms the closure and suggests an alternative route.
Aaja Ratnapark area ma kuna road haru bandha chhan event ko lagi?

Ho, aaja Ratnapark area ma ek local event chalirako chha, so main road bandha chha. Tapai Tripureshwor huda Ason ra Indrachowk ko route use garna saknuhunchha. Tyo route le tapailai tyo area bypass gari dinchha.
Customer is asking if there are any ongoing protests affecting traffic. The agent provides information on the protests and advises caution.
Aile kahi protest chalirako chha ra traffic ma effect parirako chha?

Hajur, aile Baneshwor area ma student unions le protest gari rako chhan, jasle traffic ma slight effect parirako chha. Ma suggest garnechu ki tapai yo area avoid garnuhos ya dhyanpurvak travel garnuhos.
The customer wants to know if the recent rains have caused any traffic issues. The agent updates on the situation and suggests driving carefully.
Pachhillo pani pareko le traffic ma kei problem aako chha?
Pani parepachi kati road slippery bhako chhan ra kati thau ma minor accidents pani bhako chha. So, tapai drive garda extra careful hunuhos ra possible bhaye public transport use garnuhos.
Customer is curious about the usual traffic pattern on weekends. The agent provides insights on weekend traffic and leisure travel tips.
Weekend ma traffic ko pattern kasari hunchha usually?

Weekend ma Kathmandu valley bhitra traffic ali kam hunchha because dherai manche haru outing ko lagi valley baira janchhan. Tara, tourist spots tira traffic badhi hunchha. So, tapai leisure travel plan gardai hunuhunchha bhane, early morning depart garna ramro hunchha.
Customer wants to know if there's a better time to visit Thamel to avoid traffic. The agent offers suggestions and mentions parking availability.
Thamel visit garna ko lagi traffic avoid garna kun time best hunchha?
Thamel ma traffic normally bihana ko time ma kam hunchha. So, bihana early gayera visit garna best hunchha. Plus, parking ko pani ramro availability hunchha tyo time ma.
The customer inquires about the traffic situation during festivals in Kathmandu. The agent gives a brief on expected traffic and advises on best practices.
Festivals ko bela Kathmandu ma traffic kasto hunchha?

Festivals ko time ma traffic ekdum busy hunchha, especially main market areas tira. Ma suggest garnechu ki tapai public transport use garnuhos ra patience rakhnuhos. Ani, festival ko schedule herera travel plan garna pani madat garnechha.
Customer is planning a trip to Pokhara and asks about the road conditions. The agent provides the latest updates and travel tips.
Pokhara jane highway ko road condition kasto chha aile?

Aile Pokhara jane Prithvi Highway ma road condition ekdum ramro chha. Tara, kati thau ma construction chalirako le slight disturbances huna sakchha. Ma suggest garnechu ki tapai bihana early travel suru garnuhos, ani regular breaks linuhos safety ko lagi.

Conversation between customer and agent about the availability of accessible transportation for disabled individuals. The agent uses a mix of Nepali colloquial words and English to inform about the services provided.
Disabled manche haru ko lagi kun kun transportation options available chhan?

Namaste! Hajur, hamro transportation service ma specially designed vehicles chhan jasle disabled manche haru lai comfortable ra secure travel provide garchha. Wheelchair access ko lagi ramp haru ra enough space chha. Plus, drivers haru pani trained chhan help garna ko lagi. Kehi extra assistance ko jarurat parema, kripaya advance ma booking garera inform garnuhos.
Customer inquires about the cost of transportation services for people with disabilities, and the agent provides a detailed response with possible discounts.
Disabled individuals ko lagi transportation service ko cost kati ho?

Yas ko lagi, hami sasto ra reasonable rates offer garchhau. Plus, regular basis ma travel gareko disabled customers lai discount pani provide garchhau. Exact rates ko lagi, tapai hami sanga contact garnu bhayo bhane, hami tapai lai detailed quotation provide garna sakchhau. Aafno travel ko details dinuhos, ani hami sahayogi hunechhau.
Customer asks about the safety measures in place for disabled passengers, and the agent reassures with specifics about the safety features and protocols.
Disabled passengers ko lagi safety measures kasto chha tapai haru ko service ma?

Safety hamro priority ho. Hamro sabai vehicles ma seat belts ra safety locks chhan, jo specially designed chhan disabled passengers ko lagi. Plus, emergency button haru pani chhan jasle direct help ko lagi signal pathaucha. Drivers pani safety training through gareka chhan, so tapai le biswas garera travel garna saknuhunchha.
The customer is curious about the training of drivers for handling disabled passengers, and the agent explains the comprehensive training program.
Tapai ko drivers haru disabled passengers sanga kasari deal garne garchhan?

Hamro drivers haru special training prapt garchhan jasle uniharu lai disabled passengers ko care garna ra uniharu sanga respectfully vyavhar garna sikhaucha. Yo training ma communication skills, emergency response, ra vehicle ko specific features ko handling pani samavesh chha. Hami chahan chhau ki hamro customers le safe ra comfortable journey anubhav garnuhos.
A customer inquires about the booking process for accessible transportation, and the agent provides a step-by-step guide.
Accessible transportation ko booking kasari garne?

Booking process ekdum simple chha. Tapai hamro website ma jana saknuhunchha ya feri phone ma call garera pani booking garne option chha. Website ma 'Accessibility Services' ko section ma gayesi form fill up garnuhos. Kehi specific requirements chha bhane, tyo pani mention garnuhos. Phone ma call garda, hami tapai ko details liyera booking confirm garidinchhau. Advance booking garera, tapai lai best service dinchhau.
The agent discusses the availability of transportation for unexpected trips for disabled individuals and how to arrange them.
Achanak ko trips ko lagi pani accessible transportation milchha?

Ho ni, achanak ko trips ko lagi pani hami accessible transportation provide garchhau. Tara, yadi possible bhayo bhane, advance ma inform garnu ramro hunchha jasto ki hami tapai ko travel lai ajhai ramro sanga manage garna sakchhau. Emergency situation ma, hami try garchhau best available option provide garna. So, kehi urgent plan bhayo bhane, kripaya hami lai asap contact garnuhos.
Customer questions about the types of vehicles available for disabled passengers, and the agent lists the options with features.
Disabled passengers ko lagi kun kun types ko vehicles available chhan?

Hami sanga different types ko vehicles chhan jasle disabled passengers ko needs fulfill garchha. Jasto ki, wheelchair accessible vans, jo ma hydraulic lifts ra spacious interiors chhan. Ani, modified cars pani chhan jasle easy entry ra exit lai support garchha. Sabai vehicles ma modern safety features ra comfortable seating arrangements chhan. Tapai ko specific requirement anusar, hami vehicle recommend garnechhau.
The customer asks about the response time for accessible transportation requests, and the agent details the expected timings.
Accessible transportation ko request pathaye pachi response time kati hunchha?

Normally, hami tapai ko request paune bitikai within few minutes ma response dinchhau. Tara, peak hours or high demand ko time ma, ali delay huna sakchha. Tara hami hamesha try garchhau ki tapai lai chado response dinchhau ra tapai ko travel ko plan ma koi inconvenience na hos.
Agent explains the procedure for disabled passengers to request special assistance during their transportation.
Special assistance ko lagi request kasari garne?

Special assistance ko lagi, booking garda nai tapai le tyo request garna saknuhunchha. Form ma 'Special Assistance Required' ko box ma check mark garaunu hola. Ani, kehi specific instructions chha bhane, tyo pani detail ma lekhnuhos. Phone ma call garda pani hami lai directly bhannu bhayo bhane, hami tapai ko requirement note garchhau ra tyas accordingly arrangements garchhau.
Customer wants to know if the accessible transportation can accommodate electric wheelchairs, and the agent confirms the capability.
Electric wheelchair haru accommodate garna milchha tapai ko service ma?

Bilkul, hami sanga electric wheelchairs lai accommodate garna sakne capability chha. Hamro vehicles ma enough space ra appropriate charging ports pani chhan. Yadi tapai ko wheelchair ko khas specifications chhan, tyo pani booking garda mention garnuhos, so that hami tapai ko journey lai dallai comfortable banauna sakchhau.
Customer is asking about the driver's license requirements for renting a car and the agent is providing detailed information about the types of licenses accepted and any additional requirements.
Car rent garna ko lagi kun kun license chahiyo?

Namaste! Car rent garna ko lagi tapai sanga valid Nepali driver's license hunu jaruri chha. International license pani chaleko hunchha tara yo Nepal ma recognized honu paryo. Ani khusi ko kura, yadi tapai sanga international driving permit chha bhane, tyo pani accept garchhau. Tara, license sanga sathai passport ko photocopy ra visa ko details pani chahiyo hunchha. Kunai confusion chha bhane, hamro office ma direct aunu hola, hamile sabai clear garidinchhau.
The customer is inquiring about the minimum and maximum rental duration for a car and the associated charges, and the agent is responding with detailed information.
Car rent ko lagi minimum ra maximum kati time ko lagi lin sakinchha, ra charges kati parla?

Sure! Minimum car rent ko lagi ek din ko lagi lin saknuhunchha, ra maximum kati bela samma chahincha bhane tyo tapai ko requirement ma depend garchha. Charges ta car ko model ra rent ko duration ma based hunchha. Basic model ko lagi ek din ko Rs. 2000 dekhi suru hunchha, ani luxury cars haru ko lagi price badhi hunchha. Long term rent ma discount ko facility pani chha. Detail pricing ko lagi hamro website herne hola, ani kunai confusion lage bhane hamro customer service lai call garne hola.
The customer is asking about the insurance coverage included with car rentals, and the agent is explaining the types of insurance provided and the benefits.
Car rent ma insurance coverage kasto hunchha?

Hamro car rentals ma insurance coverage ekdum ramro hunchha. Basic coverage ma third-party liability insurance include hunchha, jasle aru ko property ko damage ra injury ko against ma protection dinchha. Full coverage ma collision damage waiver (CDW) ra theft protection (TP) pani included hunchha. Yadi tapai full coverage linu hunchha bhane, kunai accident ma car ko damage ko lagi tapai lai chinta linu pardaina. Yadi tapai ko lagi kei specific insurance ko requirement chha bhane, hamro team lai sodhnu hola, hamile customize gari sakchhau.
Customer wants to know if they can add additional drivers to the rental agreement and the agent is providing information on how to do so and any extra costs.
Car rent ma aru driver haru add garna milcha?

Ho ni, tapai le car rent ma additional drivers add garna saknuhunchha. Yadi tapai sanga aru sathi haru chhan bhane, uniharu ko details pani rent agreement ma include garna sakinchha. Tara samjhanu hola, prati additional driver ko lagi alik extra charge lagna sakchha. Normally, Rs. 500 per driver ko hisab le charge hunchha. Sabai driver ko valid license ra age proof pani chahiyo hunchha. Yadi tapai lai aru information chahiyo bhane, hamro customer service lai call garne hola.
The customer is questioning the fuel policy for the car rentals, and the agent is explaining the options available and what is expected upon return of the vehicle.
Car rent garepachi fuel policy kasto hunchha?

Car rent ko fuel policy ta simple chha. Tapai le car linu bhanda agadi full tank ma fuel hunchha, ra tapai le return garda ni same condition ma car lai full tank ma fuel halera dinu parne hunchha. Yadi tapai le car empty tank ma return garchhau bhane, fuel ko current market rate ma charge garnechhau. Yadi tapai le pre-paid fuel option linu hunchha bhane, tapai lai return ma fuel ko tension linu pardaina. Yadi tapai lai further detail chahiyo bhane, hamro website ma visit garne hola.
The customer is asking about age restrictions for renting a car, and the agent is providing information on the minimum age requirement and any additional fees for younger drivers.
Car rent garna ko lagi age limit kati ho?

Car rent garna ko lagi minimum age 21 years hunchha. Yadi tapai 21 dekhi 25 years ko bich ma hunchha bhane, young driver surcharge lagna sakchha. Yo charge le tapai ko total rent ma alik extra cost thapchha, kina ki insurance ko risk alik high hunchha young drivers ko lagi. Tara 25 years bhanda mathi ko age ko lagi kunai extra charge haina. Yadi tapai ko lagi specific question chha bhane, hamro customer service team ready chha tapai ko help garna.
Customer is inquiring about the acceptable payment methods for car rentals, and the agent is listing the various options and any requirements for each.
Car rent ko lagi kun kun payment methods accept garchhau?

Hamro car rentals ma different payment methods accept garchhau. Cash, debit card, credit card, ra online banking options haru available chhan. Credit card ko lagi, tapai ko card ma enough credit limit hunu jaruri chha, kina ki security deposit ko lagi block garna parne hunchha. Debit card ko lagi, bank ko authorization letter chahiyo hunchha. Online payment ko lagi, hamro website ma secure payment gateway chha, jaha tapai hassle-free payment garna saknuhunchha. Kunai confusion chha bhane, hamro customer service lai call garne hola.
The customer wants to know about the different vehicle options available for rent, and the agent is describing the range of cars from economy to luxury.
Car rent ko lagi kun kun vehicle options chhan?

Hamro car rentals ma dherai variety ko vehicles chhan. Economy class dekhi luxury class samma, tapai ko budget ra preference ma milne gari. Economy class ma small hatchbacks chhan, jo budget friendly hunchhan. Mid-range ma sedans ra SUVs chhan, jo family trips ko lagi ekdum sahi hunchhan. Ra luxury class ma, high-end sedans ra premium SUVs chhan, jo special occasions ko lagi perfect hunchhan. Yadi tapai ko specific requirement chha bhane, hamro website ma available options haru herne hola. Kunai confusion lage bhane, hamro customer service team lai call garne hola.
The customer is asking about the booking process for renting a car, and the agent is providing a step-by-step guide on how to reserve a vehicle.
Car rent ko lagi booking process kasto hunchha?

Car rent ko booking process ekdum sajilo chha. Pahila ta, tapai hamro website ma jana saknuhunchha ani tapai ko chahine vehicle select garna saknuhunchha. Tya tapai ko travel ko date ra time enter garnu hunchha, ani personal details ra payment information provide garnu hunchha. Booking confirm bhaye pachi, tapai lai confirmation email ra booking details pathauchhau. Yadi tapai le direct office ma aayera book garna chahanu hunchha bhane tyo pani garna saknuhunchha. Kunai confusion chha bhane, hamro customer service lai call garne hola, hamile tapai ko sahayata garnechhau.
The customer wants to understand the cancellation policy for car rentals, and the agent is explaining the terms and any associated fees for cancelling a reservation.
Car rent cancel garema policy kasto hunchha?

Car rent ko cancellation policy ma, booking miteri 24 hours agadi cancel garema kunai charge lagdaina. Tara 24 hours bhanda kam time ma cancel garyo bhane, ek din ko rent ko charge lagna sakchha. Yadi tapai le pre-payment gareko hunchha ra cancel garema, refund policy ko terms and conditions apply hunchha. Yadi tapai ko plan change bhayo ra cancel garna chahanu hunchha bhane, jati chado hunchha tyati ramro. Kunai confusion chha bhane, hamro customer service lai call garne hola, hamile tapai ko help garnechhau.
Customer inquiring about the validity and cost of tourist passes for public transportation. The agent provides a clear and informative response, including additional options for tourists.
Tourist pass ko validity ra price kati ho?

Namaste! Tourist pass ko validity ek haptadekhi ek mahina samma ko chha, ra price chai NPR 500 dekhi 1500 samma ko hunchha. Price pass ko duration ra transportation options ma vary hunchha. Ani, yadi tapai ekdum explore garne mood ma hunchha bhane, hamro unlimited travel pass pani chha, jasle tapai lai katro discounts ra extra benefits dinechha. Yadi aru kehi jankari chahincha bhane, hamro customer service ma samparka garna saknuhunchha.
Customer is asking about the benefits of purchasing a tourist pass. The agent enthusiastically describes the advantages and encourages the customer to consider the pass.
Tourist pass kinne fayda ke cha?

Tourist pass kinera tapai lai dherai sahuliyat milnechha. Pahilo, tapai jati pani public transportation haru unlimited chadna saknuhunchha, tyo pani bina tension. Doosro, kahile kahi special tourist attractions ma discount pani paunu hunchha. Ra teesro, tapai ko travel ko experience ekdum hassle-free ra comfortable hunchha. Yadi tapai Nepal ma ghumauna aako chha bhane, tourist pass ekdum babbal option ho!
Customer wants to know how to use the tourist pass on different modes of transportation. The agent gives a simple explanation with a friendly tone.
Yo tourist pass haru different transportation ma kasari use garna sakinchha?

Yo tourist pass le tapai lai bus, micro, trolley bus, ra tempos jasto public transportation ma chadna anumati dinchha. Just pass lai dekhaunu bhayo bhane chaleko. Plus, pass ma QR code pani chha, jasle tapai lai chadna ko lagi tapai ko seat confirm garna sahayog garnechha. Kada, sajilo ra digital!
The customer is asking about the process for renewing a tourist pass. The agent responds with the necessary steps and offers additional assistance if needed.
Mero tourist pass sakyo, renew kasari garna sakinchha?

Tourist pass renew garna ko lagi tapai le hamro official website ma login garnu parchha ani 'Renew Pass' option ma janchha. Tyaha bata tapai le easily pass renew garera print garna saknuhunchha. Yadi tapai lai website ma problem aayo bhane, hamro customer service lai call garnu hai, hamile sahayog garchhau.
Customer wants to know where they can purchase a tourist pass. The agent lists the locations and suggests the easiest method for the customer.
Tourist pass kaha bata kinna sakinchha?

Tourist pass kinna ko lagi tapai le major bus parks, tourist information centers, ra hamro online portal bata kinna saknuhunchha. Maile suggest garnechhu online kinna, jasle tapai lai line ma basera time waste garna bata bachauchha ra tapai ko convenience ko lagi home delivery ko option pani chha.
A customer is inquiring if there are any special tourist passes for children. The agent provides details on child passes and their benefits.
Bachha haru ko lagi tourist pass ko khas arrangement chha ki chhaina?

Ho ni, bachha haru ko lagi special tourist pass chha. Yo pass le bachha haru lai 50% ko discount dinechha public transportations ma. Ani bachha haru ko safety ra comfort ko lagi pani hamile extra care linchhau. Yadi tapai ko bachha sanga travel garna lako chha bhane, yo bachha ko pass le tapai lai aru ni sahuliyat dinchha.
Customer is part of a group and wants to know if there are any group discounts for tourist passes. The agent explains the group discount policy.
Group ma travel garda tourist pass ko lagi khasai discount chha ki chhaina?

Group travelers lai definitely discount chha. Yadi tapai ko group ma 10 vanda badhi manche chha bhane, hamile tapai haru lai 10% ko group discount provide garchhau. Ani group pass le tapai haru lai ekai choti ma travel garna ko lagi sahuliyat dinechha, plus, tapai haru ko coordination pani sajilo hunchha. So, group ma travel garda tourist pass le dherai benefits chhan.
The customer is curious about the refund policy for tourist passes in case of cancellation. The agent outlines the terms and conditions for refunds.
Yadi maile tourist pass cancel garna chahanchhu bhane refund ko policy kasto chha?

Tourist pass ko refund policy ma, yadi tapai le pass kinera 24 ghanta bhanda kam samay ma cancel garchha bhane full refund hunchha. Tara 24 ghanta pachi ko cancellation ma certain percentage as a service charge katainchha. Yadi tapai le clear terms ra conditions bujhna chahanchha bhane, hamro website ma visit garera herda ramro hunchha.
A senior citizen customer is asking if there are any concessions on tourist passes for them. The agent happily informs about the special rates for senior citizens.
Senior citizens lai tourist pass ma kasaiko offer chha ki chhaina?

Senior citizens ko lagi hamisanga ekdum special rates chhan. Tapai lai 30% samma ko discount milnechha tourist pass ma. Ra sathai, hamro staff le tapai ko comfort ra safety ko lagi special care garnechhan. Senior citizen pass le tapai lai travel ma ek extra layer of convenience provide garnechha.
Student customer is inquiring about any student discounts available for tourist passes. The agent provides information on student rates and how to avail them.
Students lai tourist pass ma discount chha ki chhaina?

Students lai pani tourist pass ma discount chha. Tapai le valid student ID dekhauda tapai lai 20% ko discount milnechha. Ra yadi tapai group ma travel gardaichha bhane, tyo discount aru badhi huna sakchha. So, student ID sanga travel garda nabhulnu hai, discount ko fayda uthauna.
Customer inquiring about the availability and names of local ride-sharing apps in Nepal. The agent responds with information and additional details on how to use them.
Local ride-sharing apps k cha Nepal ma?

Nepal ma Pathao, Tootle, ra InDriver chhan jasle tapai lai sahajai ride-sharing ko suvidha dinchhan. Yo apps haru download garna ko lagi tapai ko smartphone ma App Store ya Google Play Store bata easily download garna saknuhunchha. Ani, app open gari, tapai ko destination set gari ride book garnu hos. Payment options ma pani tapai le cash, e-wallet, or online banking methods use garna saknuhunchha. Ride ko experience sajilo ra comfortable hunchha, ani drivers haru verified ra reliable hunchhan.
Customer is asking about the safety measures of local ride-sharing services. The agent provides a reassuring response with examples of safety features.
Ride-sharing apps ko safety measures kasto cha?

Ride-sharing apps haru le safety lai dherai nai priority dinchhan. Sabai drivers haru ko proper background check huni garho chha, ani sabai rides track hunchhan real-time ma. Plus, emergency button feature pani cha app ma, jasle tapai lai immediate help linu ko lagi use garna saknuhunchha. Ani, ride ko end ma, tapai le driver ko rating ra feedback pani dinu hunchha, jasle service lai aru ramro banauna ma help garchha. Sahi ho, tapai le worry nagarnu hola, safety ko lagi kada measures haru chhan.
Customer wants to know about the fare rates of ride-sharing apps. The agent explains the fare calculation and gives tips on getting the best rates.
Ride-sharing apps ko fare rate kasari calculate hunchha?

Ride-sharing apps ko fare calculation trip ko distance ra traffic ko condition ma base garera hunchha. Basic fare ek fixed amount hunchha, ani tyas mathi per kilometer ko rate add hunchha. Rush hour ma huda fare ali badhi huna sakchha. Best rates pauna ko lagi, tapai le non-peak hours ma travel garna ko lagi try garna saknuhunchha. Ani, app haru ma occasional discounts ra promo codes pani hunchhan, jasle tapai ko journey lai ekdum sasto banaidincha. Ride book garne bela, fare estimate pani dekhincha app ma, so tapai le tyo herera decide garna saknuhunchha.
The customer is curious about the payment options for ride-sharing services. The agent lists the options and suggests the most convenient ones.
Ride-sharing ma payment options ke ke chhan?

Ride-sharing apps ma different payment options chhan. Tapai le cash payment garna saknuhunchha, e-wallet jasto ki eSewa, Khalti, ra IME Pay use garna saknuhunchha, ki online banking ra credit/debit cards pani chalchha. Most convenient option e-wallet ho, kina ki tapai le ride ko end ma hassle-free payment garna saknuhunchha ani kati pani cash carry garnu pardaina. Plus, e-wallets ma time to time cashback offers ra discounts pani hunchhan, jasle tapai ko ride lai aru sasto banaidincha.
Customer inquires about the types of vehicles available in ride-sharing services. The agent provides details on the variety and how to choose.
Ride-sharing ma k kisim ko vehicles paucha?

Ride-sharing apps ma tapai le scooter, motorbike, car, ra SUV asti ko options paunu hunchha. Tapai ko requirement ra comfort ko hisab le tapai le vehicle choose garna saknuhunchha. App ma ride book garda, vehicle type select garna milchha. Scooter ra motorbike chito ra traffic ma navigate garna sajilo hunchha, tara comfort ko lagi car ra SUV ramro hunchhan. Plus, group travel ko lagi bigger vehicles pani chhan jasto ki vans ra minibuses.
A customer asks if ride-sharing apps offer services outside the city. The agent explains the scope of services and provides additional guidance.
Ride-sharing apps le city baira pani service dinchha ki dinna?

Kehi ride-sharing apps haru le city baira ko destinations haru ma pani service dinchhan. Tara, yo service haru sabai apps ma available huna sakchha bhane chhaina. Tara, Pathao ra Tootle jasto apps le city ko outskirts samma service dinchhan. Long distance ko lagi, tapai le app ma special request submit garna saknuhunchha, ani driver haru sangai negotiate garna saknuhunchha. Tara city baira ko trips ko lagi, fare rates ali different huna sakchha, so tyo pani consider garnu parne hunchha.
Customer is interested in knowing about any loyalty programs offered by ride-sharing apps. The agent describes the programs and their benefits.
Ride-sharing apps ma loyalty programs chhan ki chhaina?

Ho, kehi ride-sharing apps le loyalty programs haru offer garchhan. Jasto ki, frequent users lai points accumulate garna ko option hunchha, jasle future rides ma discounts or free rides ko form ma redeem garna saknuhunchha. Ani, referral programs pani chhan, jasle tapai le sathi haru lai invite garna saknuhunchha ani bonus points earn garna saknuhunchha. Yo loyalty programs le tapai ko ride-sharing experience lai ekdum babbal banaidincha, ani tapai le regular basis ma ride liyera pani some money save garna saknuhunchha.
The customer wants to know how to report issues with a ride or driver. The agent gives instructions on the reporting process.
Ride ki driver sanga problem bhayo bhane kasari report garne?

Kunai pani problem bhaye, tapai le app ma gayera 'Help' or 'Support' section ma jana saknuhunchha. Tyaha, 'Report an issue' ma click gari, tapai ko issue ko details provide garna saknuhunchha. Yo process le tapai ko concern lai directly company ko customer service team samm puryaucha. Ani, tapai le ride ko end ma feedback ra rating pani leave garna saknuhunchha, jasle company lai service improve garna ma help garchha. Kehi urgent cha bhane, app ma diye ko emergency contact number ma pani call garna saknuhunchha.
A customer questions about the environmental impact of ride-sharing services. The agent provides a positive response highlighting eco-friendly practices.
Ride-sharing services ko environmental impact kasto cha?

Ride-sharing services le environment ma positive impact lyaidinchhan kina ki yo traditional taxi services bhanda efficient ra eco-friendly hunchhan. Shared rides le traffic congestion kam garchha ani carbon emissions ni reduce hunchhan. Ani, kehi ride-sharing companies haru le electric vehicles ra hybrids pani use garchhan, jasle environment lai aru protect garna ma help garchha. Plus, digital payment methods le paper waste ni kam garchha. Overall, ride-sharing le sustainable transportation ko concept lai promote garchha, jasle hamro environment lai dalai help garchha.
The customer is asking for tips on how to get the best experience using ride-sharing apps. The agent offers practical advice and suggestions.
Ride-sharing apps use garda best experience pauna ko lagi tips dinu na.

Best experience pauna ko lagi, yo tips haru follow garnu hos: 1) Ride book garne bela, location ra destination ekdum accurately set garnuhos. 2) Peak hours avoid garnuhos jati sakincha, yo le fare kam hunchha ra traffic ma pani alik kam time spend garnu parchha. 3) Driver ko sath polite ra respectful hunuhos. 4) Ride ko safety features ko barema thaha paunu hos, jasto ki emergency button. 5) Promotions ra discounts ko lagi app notifications on rakhnuhos. 6) Feedback ra ratings honestly provide garnuhos, yo le service improve garna ma help garchha. Ani, lastly, enjoy garnuhos! Ride-sharing le tapai ko travel lai convenient ra flexible banaidincha.
Customer inquiring about the local public transportation options available and their schedules. The agent provides detailed information using a mix of Nepali colloquial words and English.
Local bus ko schedule ra routes kasto cha?

Namaste! Yaha ko local buses haru bihana 6 baje dekhi sanjh 8 samma chalcha. Different routes haru chhan, jasle city ko main areas haru cover garchha. Route map ra schedule ko lagi tapai hamro app download garna saknuhunchha, jaha tapai live updates pani paunu hunchha.
Customer asks about the frequency of microbuses in the city and the agent responds with the necessary details using Nepali slangs.
Microbus haru ko frequency kati chha?
Microbus haru ta city bhitra dherai chhan ni. Normally, every 15 minutes ma euta micro aaunchha. Main stops haru ma to micro ko line nai lagcha, ekdum chito services chha.
A customer is curious about the night-time public transportation services, and the agent gives a comprehensive answer.
Raat ko time ma public transportation chalcha ki chaldaina?

Raat ko time ma pani public transportation chalcha tara frequency alik kam hunchha. Last bus normally raat ko 10 baje samma chalcha. Tara emergency ko lagi, night cabs pani available hunchhan. Tei pani, raat ko travel garda safety ko lagi pre-booking garna ramro hunchha.
The customer is inquiring about the cost of public transportation and the agent explains the pricing structure.
Public transportation ko ticket price kati ho?

Ticket price distance ra service type ma depend garchha. Short distance ko lagi normally Rs. 20-30 bhitra hunchha, tara long distance ra deluxe services ko lagi price badhcha. Detailed price list ko lagi tapai hamro website check garna saknuhunchha.
Customer wants to know if there are any student discounts for public transportation and the agent responds accordingly.
Student discount chha public transportation ma?
Ho, student discount chha. Valid student ID dekhauda tapai ticket ma 20% discount paunu hunchha. Yehi offer school ra college students haru lai apply hunchha.
The customer is asking about the accessibility features of public buses for differently-abled individuals, and the agent provides the necessary information.
Public buses ma differently-abled individuals ko lagi kei special arrangements chhan?

Hamro public buses ma differently-abled individuals ko lagi special seating arrangements chhan. Plus, wheelchair ramp haru pani chhan. Bus staff haru pani sahayog ko lagi ready hunchhan. Yadi tapai lai extra assistance ko awasyakta chha bhane, tapai le bus driver lai agadi nai inform garna saknuhunchha.
A customer queries about the pet policy on public transit, and the agent clarifies the rules.
Public transportation ma pet haru lai lyauna pauchha ki paudaina?

Generally, public transportation ma large pets haru lai lyauna allowed haina. Tara small pets, jastai birds ra cats, jo ki proper pet carrier ma chhan, tyo allowed chha. Tapaiko pet lai lyauna chahane bhaye rules ra regulations ko lagi tapai le hamro customer service ma call garna saknuhunchha.
The customer inquires about the cleanliness and hygiene protocols on public buses, especially during the pandemic, and the agent provides a reassuring response.
Public buses ma cleanliness ra hygiene ko kasto vyavastha chha?

Aaainch, tapai ko chinta bujheko chhu. Hamro public buses ma regular cleaning ra sanitization ko process follow garchhau. Har ek trip ko end ma bus haru lai sanitize gariyeko hunchha. Plus, hand sanitizers ra masks haru pani passengers ko lagi available hunchha. Safety first ho ni!
The customer asks if there's a lost and found service for items left on public transportation, and the agent explains the procedure.
Public transportation ma kei chhodiyema lost and found ko service chha?

Ho, lost and found ko service chha. Yadi tapai ko kei saman public transportation ma chhodnu bhayo bhane, tapai le turuntai hamro customer service lai contact garnu parne hunchha. Hamro team le found items lai collect garchha ra owner lai return garna try garchhau.
A customer wants to know how to get real-time updates on bus arrivals and departures, and the agent suggests a solution.
Bus ko arrival ra departure ko real-time updates kasari paune?

Real-time updates ko lagi tapai hamro official mobile app use garna saknuhunchha. App ma tapai live location tracking, arrival times, ra traffic updates paunu hunchha. Plus, push notifications ko setting garna saknuhunchha, jasle tapailai timely updates dinchha.
Customer is inquiring if the hotel has family and pet-friendly rooms available and what amenities are offered. The agent provides a detailed response.
Tapaiko hotel ma family ra pet-friendly rooms chhan ki chhaina?

Ho ni, hamro hotel ma family ra pet-friendly rooms chhan. Hami sano chora chori haru ko lagi play area ra game room provide garchhau, ani pet ko lagi special walking area ra pet care services pani chhan. Tapaiko family ra pet haru lai comfortable ra enjoyable stay ko lagi hami le sabai arrangements garchhau. Kehi special requirements bhaye ni kripaya sodhnuhola, hamro team tapai lai sahayog garna ready chha.
Customer wants to know about the additional charges for pet accommodation and the facilities provided for pets.
Pet ko lagi extra charge lagcha ki lagdaina? Ani kun kun facilities provide garchhau pets ko lagi?

Pet ko accommodation ko lagi kehi nominal extra charge lagchha. Ani facilities ma, hami pet grooming, veterinary service, ra daily pet walking ko arrangement garchhau. Tapaiko pet lai ekdum ramro care diinchhau, taki tapai stress free huna saknuhunchha.
The customer is asking about the types of rooms available for families with children and what activities are there for kids.
Family sanga aune haru ko lagi kasto kasto rooms chhan ra bachha haru ko lagi kei activities chhan?

Families lai sochdai, hamro hotel ma spacious family suites chhan with separate kids' bedroom. Bachha haru ko lagi hamro hotel ma indoor play area, swimming pool, ra children's movie nights ko arrangement chha. Ani hami occasionaly kids' cooking classes ra art workshops pani organize garchhau.
A customer is curious if there are any restrictions on the size or breed of pets allowed in the hotel.
Hotel ma pets ko size ya breed ko lagi kehi restrictions chhan?

Hami sabai size ra breed ko pets lai welcome garchhau, tara kehi specific guidelines follow garnu parne chha, jasto ki pet-friendly areas ra leash ko use. Tapaiko pet ko safety ra aru guests sanga ni ramro environment maintain garna ko lagi yini kura haru jaruri chhan.
The customer inquires about the meal options for children and if there are any special menus for kids.
Bachha haru ko lagi meal options k cha? Kids special menu chha ki chhaina?

Ho, bachha haru ko lagi hamro hotel ma special kids' menu chha. Yo menu ma healthy ra tasty options haru chhan, jasle bachha haru ko nutritional needs lai dhyan ma rakhera banako hunchha. Plus, hami allergy ra dietary restrictions ko lagi pani special arrangements garna sakchhau.
Customer wants to know if the hotel provides babysitting services and what the charges might be.
Tapaiko hotel ma babysitting service chha? Ra yesko charge kati ho?

Ji hajur, hamro hotel ma professional babysitting services available chhan. Charges service ko duration ra bachha ko sankhya ma depend garchha. Tapaile advance ma book garna saknuhunchha, ani hamro staff le tapai ko requirements anusar best possible care provide garnechhan.
The customer is asking if there is a secure area where they can leave their pet while they go out for a few hours.
Kei hours bahira jada pet lai chhodna secure place chha?

Ho, tapai ko pet lai safe ra secure rakhne hamro hotel ma pet daycare center chha. Yaha ma trained staff haru chhan jo tapai ko pet ko care garchhan. Plus, CCTV surveillance pani chha, jasle tapai lai peace of mind dinchha.
A customer is inquiring about the outdoor activities available for families with children in the hotel.
Hotel ma bachha haru sanga family ko lagi outdoor activities k k chhan?

Hamro hotel ma family-friendly outdoor activities ko ekdum ramro selection chha. Hiking trails, picnic spots, cycling, ra bird-watching activities chhan. Plus, hami occasionaly family treasure hunts ra nature walks pani organize garchhau, jasle tapai ra tapai ko family lai ekdum dallai time provide garnechha.
The customer is asking for recommendations on rooms suitable for a large family.
Thulo family ko lagi suitable rooms ko recommendation dinu na.

Thulo family haru ko lagi, hamro hotel ma family suites ekdum perfect hunchhan. Yo suites ma multiple bedrooms, living area, ra kitchenette chhan. Plus, hami adjoining rooms ko option pani provide garchhau, jasle jati members chhan sabai ekai thau ma basna sakchhan.
Customer is asking if the hotel has any package deals for families staying for an extended period.
Extended period ko lagi family package deals chhan ki chhaina?

Ji hajur, extended stays ko lagi hami attractive family package deals offer garchhau. Yo packages ma discounted room rates, complimentary breakfast, ra special activities for kids and pets included hunchhan. Long term ma basne families ko lagi yo deals ekdum sahi hunchha.
Customer inquiring about the availability of airport shuttle services and the booking process. The agent responds with details and additional helpful information.
Airport shuttle service book garna milchha?

Ho, hamro hotel le airport shuttle service provide garchha. Tapai ko arrival ko details pahila dinu parne hunchha, ani hamile pickup ko arrangement garnechhau. Yo service ko laagi minimal charge lagcha, tara ekdum comfortable ra reliable hunchha. Kati jana ko lagi shuttle chahincha tyo pani specify garnu hola.
Customer asking about local transportation options provided by the hotel. The agent gives a detailed answer about the available choices and offers to assist further.
Hotel bata local transportation ko suvidha chha?

Ho, hamro hotel bata tapai lai local transportation ko dherai options haru chhan. Taxi, local bus services, ani private car hire pani arrange garna sakchhau. Tapai ko plan ra budget anusar best option suggest garnechhau. Thapai ko kaha jana chha ra kati jana hunuhunchha tyo pani bhannu hola, taaki hamile sajilo sanga manage garau.
Customer wants to know the schedule of airport shuttle services. The agent provides the timing and asks for any special requests regarding the service.
Airport shuttle ko schedule kasto chha?

Airport shuttle service bihana 5 baje dekhi raat ko 11 baje samma chalchha. Tapaiko flight ko time anusar, hamile shuttle ko timing adjust garna sakchhau. Kripaya tapai ko flight details share garnu hola, ani hamile accordingly manage garchhau. Special request cha bhane pani sodhnu hola.
Customer inquires how to book the hotel's shuttle service and if advance booking is necessary. The agent explains the process and importance of advance booking.
Shuttle service kasari book garne? Advance ma booking garnu parchha?

Shuttle service ko laagi tapai le hamro hotel ma direct call garera book garna saknuhunchha, ya online form bharera pani hunchha. Advance booking garnu ramro hunchha, kina bhane yo le tapai lai guaranteed seat dinchha ra last minute ko rush bata bachauchha. Tapaiko travel ko details dinu bhaye, hamile seat reserve garchhau.
Customer is curious about the cost of the shuttle service from the airport to the hotel. The agent provides the pricing and mentions any additional services included.
Airport bata hotel samma shuttle service ko laagi kati charge hunchha?

Airport bata hotel samma shuttle service ko laagi jamma NPR 1500 lagcha. Yo price ma luggage handling ra comfortable ride samet chha. Yadi tapai ko group size thulo cha bhane, group discount ko suvidha pani chha. Aru kura janna chahane bhaye sodhnu hola.
Customer inquires about transportation options for local sightseeing. The agent offers different modes of transportation and explains the benefits.
Local sightseeing ko lagi transportation chahincha, k vannu hunchha?

Local sightseeing ko lagi hamro hotel le various transportation modes offer garchha. Private car hire, guided tours, ra bike rentals pani chhan. Private car hire le tapailai flexibility ra comfort dinchha, guided tours le local insights ra stories provide garchha, ani bike rentals le freedom ra adventure ko experience dinchha. Tapai ko preference ra budget anusar, hamile sahayog garchhau.
A customer with a group is looking for transportation options. The agent describes the group transportation services and offers to make arrangements.
Hamro sathi haru ko group cha, transportation ko laagi kasto arrangement garna saknuhunchha?

Group transportation ko laagi, hamro hotel le mini-van dekhi bus samma ko options haru provide garchha. Tapai ko group ko size ra requirements anusar, hamile best vehicle ko arrangement garchhau. Group ko laagi special rates pani chha. Kripaya tapai ko travel ko details dinu hola, taaki hamile sajilo sanga manage garna sakau.
Customer needs a customized airport shuttle service. The agent responds with the possibilities and asks for specific requirements.
Airport shuttle service lai customize garna milchha?

Ho, hamro shuttle service lai tapai ko needs anusar customize garna sakincha. Kripaya tapai ko specific requirements haru share garnu hola, jasto ki luxury vehicle chahincha ki, special amenities ko need cha ki, ya travel ko time ma flexibility chahincha. Hamile tapai ko anubhav lai personal ra comfortable banauna sakchhau.
A customer is asking if the shuttle service is accessible for disabled guests. The agent assures the customer about the accessibility and offers additional assistance.
Disabled guests ko lagi shuttle service accessible chha?

Ho, hamro shuttle service disabled guests ko lagi fully accessible chha. Hamile wheelchair-friendly vehicles ko arrangement garchhau, ani zarurat bhaye additional assistance ko suvidha pani provide garchhau. Tapai ko comfort ra convenience hamro priority ho, so please kunaipani special needs cha bhane hamilai agadi nai jankari dinu hola.
Customer needs to know about emergency transportation services in case of an urgent situation. The agent provides information on how the hotel can assist in such cases.
Emergency situation ma transportation service ko laagi k kura haru chha?

Emergency situation ko laagi, hamro hotel le 24/7 transportation service ko suvidha provide garchha. Tapaiko urgent situation cha bhane, hamile turunta taxi or ambulance arrange garna sakchhau. Reception ma emergency number chha, jaha tapai junaipani bela call garna saknuhunchha. Hamro staff haru trained chhan emergency response ko laagi, so tapai le chinta nagarnu hola.
Customer is inquiring about the hotel's ability to arrange a surprise birthday party in the room. The agent is explaining the services offered and additional options available for customization.
Can you guys arrange a surprise birthday setup in my room?

Definitely, we can arrange a babbal surprise birthday setup in your room. We provide room decoration, cake, and even a special dinner arrangement. Plus, if you want, we can add some katro entertainment like a live band or DJ. Just let us know your budget and preferences, and we'll make it happen.
Customer is asking about anniversary celebration services provided by the hotel. The agent gives a detailed description of the romantic package options.
What special can you do for our anniversary celebration?

For your anniversary, we offer a romantic dinner setup either at our rooftop restaurant with a panoramic view or a private candlelight dinner by the poolside. We'll decorate the space with flowers and candles to create a perfect ambiance. A complimentary cake and a bottle of wine will also be included to toast your special day. Let us make your anniversary sahi ho and unforgettable.
The customer is interested in hosting an engagement party at the hotel. The agent outlines the venue options and catering services available.
Do you have any package for hosting an engagement party?

Yes, we have several packages for hosting an engagement party. Depending on the size of your guest list, you can choose from our banquet hall or the garden area. We provide full catering services with a customizable menu, including both international and Nepali cuisines. Plus, we'll assist with decoration and music arrangements to make your event ekdum special and memorable.
A customer is asking about organizing a corporate anniversary event at the hotel. The agent discusses the professional event services offered.
We're planning our company's 10th anniversary. What can your hotel offer for such an event?

Congratulations on your company's milestone! For corporate anniversaries, we offer a comprehensive event package that includes a spacious conference hall with state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment, customized buffet or set menu options, and a dedicated event coordinator to ensure everything runs smoothly. We can also arrange for team-building activities or entertainment as per your requirements. Let's make your corporate anniversary a danger success together.
The customer is looking to book the hotel for a graduation party and asks about the services provided. The agent provides options and suggestions for a memorable event.
My brother just graduated. Can we organize a graduation party at your hotel?

Absolutely! We'd love to help you celebrate your brother's graduation. Our hotel offers a variety of venues for such parties, including a private hall or our outdoor terrace. We can cater with a customized menu, provide a DJ or live band, and even arrange for a projector to showcase his journey. Let's plan a babbal graduation party that he'll always remember.
A customer inquires about the possibility of hosting a baby shower at the hotel. The agent describes the special arrangements and services tailored for such events.
I want to host a baby shower. What kind of services can you offer?

For a baby shower, we can offer a cozy and comfortable venue decorated with soft colors and themes. Our catering team can prepare a delightful assortment of light snacks, desserts, and non-alcoholic beverages. We can also organize fun games and activities to entertain your guests. Our team will take care of all the details to ensure a warm and joyous celebration for the arrival of the new member.
The customer is asking about the hotel's ability to host a farewell party for a colleague. The agent explains the available services and how they can customize the event.
We need to organize a farewell party for a colleague. What options do you have?

We can arrange a heartfelt farewell party for your colleague. You can choose from indoor or outdoor venues based on the number of guests. Our catering services include a wide range of cuisines and we can set up a bar if required. Additionally, we can help with the decor, music, and even a slideshow presentation to reminisce the good times. Let's give your colleague a dallai send-off.
Customer wants to know if the hotel can arrange a welcome party for their friends visiting Nepal. The agent shares the details of the service and how they can make it special.
My friends are visiting Nepal for the first time. Can you arrange a welcome party for them?

Of course! We'd be thrilled to arrange a warm welcome party for your friends. We can organize it in our traditional Nepali style with cultural performances, local delicacies, and a festive atmosphere. We can also include a short sightseeing tour around the city as part of the celebration. Let's make their first impression of Nepal ekdum kada.
A customer is looking to host a reunion and is interested in the hotel's services for such an event. The agent provides information on venue selection and catering options.
Is your hotel suitable for hosting a large family reunion?

Yes, our hotel is perfect for hosting family reunions. We have multiple venues to accommodate large gatherings, including a grand ballroom and an outdoor garden space. Our catering team can prepare a feast that caters to all age groups, with both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options. We'll help you plan a reunion that's filled with joy, laughter, and delicious food.
The customer wants to celebrate a cultural festival at the hotel and is asking about the specific arrangements that can be made. The agent outlines the cultural event services they provide.
Can we celebrate Dashain at your hotel with traditional setups?

Absolutely! Celebrating Dashain at our hotel would be an honor. We can arrange a traditional setup with Dashain-specific decorations, a puja area, and authentic Nepali cuisine to mark the festival. We can also organize cultural programs to showcase our rich traditions. Let's make your Dashain celebration ambo amazing with us.
Customer inquiring about the availability of meeting rooms and Wi-Fi in the hotel. The response should be informative and use a mix of Nepali colloquial words and English.
Meeting room ra Wi-Fi ko suvidha chha hotel ma?

Hajur, hamro hotel ma meeting rooms ko ramro arrangement chha ra high-speed Wi-Fi ko facility pani chha. Meeting room haru ekdum spacious chhan ra sabai modern amenities haru le equipped chhan, jasto ki projector, sound system, ra comfortable seating arrangement. Customer asking about the charges for using the meeting rooms and if there are any packages for business events.
Meeting room use garna ko lagi charge kati lagcha? Koi business event ko package pani chha?

Meeting room ko charges different packages ma aunchha, jasle tapai ko requirements ma depend garchha. Full-day, half-day, ra hourly rates haru chhan. Ani business events ko lagi special packages pani chhan, jasle include garchha catering, technical support, ra customized room setup. Detail ko lagi please hamro sales department sanga contact garnuhos, uniharu tapai lai best option suggest garnechhan.
Customer interested in knowing if the hotel provides support for conducting online meetings or webinars.
Online meeting ra webinar ko lagi support chha ta hotel taraf bata?

Bilkul, hamro hotel ma online meeting ra webinar ko lagi full technical support chha. Hamro team le tapailai video conferencing equipment, high-quality microphones, ra other necessary technical assistance provide garnechhan. Customer inquiring if the hotel has facilities for printing and photocopying necessary for business work.
Printing ra photocopying ko suvidha chha?

Ho ni, hamro hotel ma printing ra photocopying services available chhan. Business center ma tapai le tyo suvidha haru use garna saknuhunchha. Tyasmathi, scanning ra fax services pani chhan. Kehi urgent documents haru chha bhane, hamro staff le gladly tapai lai assist garnechhan.
Customer wants to know if there are any quiet spaces in the hotel where they can work without disturbances.

Customer is inquiring about the concept of a secular state and its importance in Nepal. The agent explains the idea using colloquial words.

Entertainment ko lagi, Nepali haru mostly movies, music videos, television shows, ra web series herchan. Bollywood ra Hollywood movies sangaai, Nepali movies pani ramro popularity paudai gako chha. YouTube ma Nepali music videos ra comedy videos pani dherai herincha. Recently, Netflix ra Amazon Prime jastai streaming services pani popular bhairaheko chha.

Nepal ma media literacy ra awareness ko level kasto chha?

Media literacy ra awareness Nepal ma gradually improve bhairako chha. Schools ra colleges ma media studies ko courses haru thapincha, ra yuva pustama media prati jagarukata badhdai gako chha. Tara, rural areas ma ajhai pani media literacy ko kami chha, ra misinformation ra fake news ko chunauti pani chha.
